review: It was easy to hook up and get started , but I have a couple issues.  The first one is the fact that when you turn on the parental controls, you must enter your pin EVERY time you watch something, even when it is included in Amazon Prime.  Second issue for me is I haven't figured out how to watch anything other than what is on Amazon.  Netflix etc... Show up on my home page but when you select it, it just describes the channel????  I am thinking of returning it, my Roku works fine.Update 6/09.I figured out how to watch Netflix... Just had to click on "download".  Now I am really liking this fire stick'
